about_page.about_page_header: A modern, reliable, scalable, open and secure solution.
about_page.about_us_section: Created in 2008, Comunik is a new generation software editor operating in the field of Telecom and IT engineering. Based in Tunisia, with a subsidiary in Paris and a representation in Casablanca. Today, the company has 75 employees including 30 engineers and technicians graduated from telecom and computer science schools. Comunik has its own highly technological platforms capable of providing a secure and available service H24 More than a hundred call centers and dozens of companies in 14 countries use the Comunik suite.
about_page.certificate_section: To provide you with a quality service, we have taken the path of ISO 9001-2015 certification which defines the criteria and organizational requirements to implement a quality management system since January 27, 2021 Comunik has   obtained its certificate validated by the German firm TÜV under the number 011002015617, a document that consolidates our DNA to always provide you with solutions and services of a quality that meets your requirements. The appetite comes with eating, immediately Comunik starts the certification process according to the ISO 27001 standard to deliver you an additional guarantee of information security. See you in a few months.
about_page.stats_section_title: Deliver what your customers want every time
about_page.team_section_desc: A passionate, inspired team of leaders each bring their own energy and expertise to comunik — reasons that ultimately help us achieve higher levels of success.

footer.footer_slogan: Making the world a better place through constructing elegant hierarchies.
